FROM ( SELECT B.* , @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as COUNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM dy_power_plant WHERE DPP_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY DPP_KEYNO ) B WHERE (@ROWNUM:=0)=0 )AA WHERE 1=1
AND COUNT LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND DPP_AREA LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND DPP_NAME LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND DPP_DATE LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( COUNT LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR DPP_AREA LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR DPP_NAME LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') OR DPP_DATE LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{item.searchKeyword},'%') )
